== West Kallada (628381) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

West Kallada is a village in the [[Kunnathur]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 1335 hectares and harbouring 4655 households with total population of 18176 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 8693 and female population is 9483. Scheduled Caste Population is 4125 and Scheduled Tribes population is 50. Census Location Code of the village is 628381<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 15506 (85.31%)
* Literate male population: 7530 (86.62%)
* Literate female population: 7976 (84.11%)
